title: HOUR 3- Al Michaels Aug 24, 2020
itunes:title: HOUR 3- Al Michaels Aug 24, 2020
description:
Al Michaels talks to Dan about how hard it is to call a football game without being in the same arena. Al says that for football, you really need to be in the same arena and says he would not be interested in calling a broadcast if he was not in the arena where the game is being played.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Al Michaels talks to Dan about how hard it is to call a football game without being in the same arena. Al says that for football, you really need to be in the same arena and says he would not be interested in calling a broadcast if he was not in the arena where the game is being played.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
